page.title: 15Methodist Church, Standford.
page.content: This church comes under the pastoral care of the Haslemere Methodist Minister who takes a service fortnightly. Worship is held morning and evening each Sunday largely led by local preachers,-trained and qualified lay men and women. There is a fortnightly house fellowship during the winter.The membership of 24 are a closely knit caring group, whose strength lies in four loyal families. Special events, Harvest, Church Anniversary, 126th, and this year a flower Festival in connection with their organ, restored for over Â£2000 raised locally, are more widely supported.There are regular links with the local community: people from the Grange welcomed to services, and often in the summer scouts camping at Hatch Farm use the Standford Church Hall and they attend morning service.
